scripts.patch: npm run fix && npm version patch && gulp build
scripts.minor: npm run fix && npm version minor && gulp build
scripts.major: npm run fix && npm version major && gulp build
scripts.deploy: node scripts/firebase-preparation && firebase login && firebase deploy && node scripts/firebase-cleanup
scripts.backup: node scripts/firebase-preparation && firebase login && firebase database:get / >database-backup.json && node scripts/firebase-cleanup
